api_list.api_description: Find representatives and boundaries by postal code.

required_parameters.name: postal_code
required_parameters.description: The postal code for lookup, formatted in uppercase with no spaces.

optional_parameters.name: sets
optional_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of boundary sets to limit results.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve information about a specific country using its ISO2 country code.

required_parameters.name: country_code
required_parameters.description: Two-letter ISO code of the country.

optional_parameters.name: format_type
optional_parameters.description: The format in which to receive the data.

query: Can you provide information about the representatives in the postal code K1A 0B1 in Canada? Also, can you retrieve general country data for Canada using its ISO code?
